blogs.title: Why Do Our Ears Get Blocked on Airplanes and What Is The Solution
blogs.titleArabic: لماذا تنسد آذاننا في الطائرات وما هو الحل؟
blogs.excerpt: Discover the science behind why our ears get blocked during flights and learn effective solutions to prevent this common issue.
blogs.content: When we fly, changes in air pressure can cause our ears to feel blocked or uncomfortable. This happens because the air pressure in the airplane cabin is different from the ground level. And here's another one that bothers a lot of us — getting blocked ears. It's sometimes called "airplane ear," and may also be known as "ear barotrauma." But why do we get it, and what can we do about it?
